name: Strike Force Z
description:
----------------------------------------------Description---------------------------------------------

Strike Force Z is a Sci-Fi procedural level generator where you control

a squad of four soldiers whose mission is to Survive, Evacuate, or Hunt.  

Xenos lurk around every corner, and it's your job, as commander,

 to lead your squad to success.

-----------------------------------------------Controls------------------------------------------------

WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement.

LMB - Fire Weapon.

Z and X - Switch Unit: Z to go back, X to go forward.

E - Use Healing Item

R - Reload Weapon

------------------------------------------Unit Commands-------------------------------------------

Note: To deactivate a command on a unit, you need to repress the button 

that previously gave the unit its command.

1 - Set Overwatch:  Fires at any enemy units that come into line of sight.

2- Set Switchplay: If an enemy comes into sight, immediately switch back to this unit.

3-Set Vision: Locks the unit's vision in a direction
